It's not too short. It's has just been encoded at higher speed and has the music from Benny Hill added to it. As well as hilarious sounds when something funny happens. This has been done because the movie company thought that the movie was far too heavy and needed to be a bit more hilarious. Jack Black and Jar-Jar Binks has also been added to the movie. And we all know that a good comedy can't be longer than 1.30. The speaker voice in the beginning is Cameron Diaz. The soundtrack (by Nick Cave) has been removed and is now replaced by various Weird Al songs and a newly written track by Swedish comedy master Markoolio. Viggo Mortensen has been digitally removed and The Road now has Tom Arnold in the lead.
